trans-unit.source: Sets the geographical location identifier for the user

target.mrk: Sets the geographical location identifier for the user

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the geographical location of the user (GEOID).

trans-unit.source: This function writes to the registry the geographical location for a particular user instead of an application.

seg-source.mrk: This function writes to the registry the geographical location for a particular user instead of an application.

target.mrk: This function writes to the registry the geographical location for a particular user instead of an application.

trans-unit.source: This action affects the behavior of other applications run by the user. As a rule, the application should call this

As a rule, the application should call this

target.mrk: This action affects the behavior of other applications run by the user.
